RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 18100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 21 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Rac e Since February 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, if for $14,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COPPERHEAD CREEK was well rated early and off the inside, made a four wide move on the turn in hand, then was clear leaving the quarter pole and shifted in leaving the turn, then drew off in the drive to prove much the best under a drive. WILL E SUTTON was four wide into the first turn, vied for the lead three to four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn, could not go with the winner while staying on to be clearly second best. HASHTAG WINNING was allowed to settle early towards the inside, made a three wide bid on the turn but flattened out the final furlong, bested rest. KUMAR was reserved early on the inside, eased out on the turn and came four wide into the drive and had no rally. FIFTY SHEAS OFGREY vied for the early lead and was between rivals down the backstretch and weakened. CHRIS AND DAVE vied for the lead on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Chris and Dave
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Copperhead Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, 4 wide move in hand, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Kumar
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, eased out turn, came 4 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Fifty Sheas Ofgrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, between horses backstretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Hashtag Winning
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, bid 3 wide, flattened out, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Will E Sutton
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, vied 3 wide, bid 3 wide, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CIRCLE ME MADDEN vied for the early lead two wide, shook clear entering the far turn and drew out by the quartet pole, then drew off in the drive to prove much the best under a mild drive. DOUBLE O OTTO stalked the early pace and was three wide by the half mile marker, then chased the winner on the turn and proved to be no match for that rivals, second best. MILLBANK MAN vied for the lead on the inside and weakened. ZOPPI FISCHBEIN was motivated early and showed little, dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Millbank Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Zoppi Fischbein
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little, dull effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Circle Me Madden
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 2 wide, bid 2 wide, drew off, mild drive

ENTRY.NAME: Double O Otto
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide 1/2, chased 1/4, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 21 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Rac e Since February 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WAHOOWA WAHOOWA bumped at the start, stalked the pace, made a three wide bid on the turn to take over by the quarter pole, then drew off smartly to prove best, under right handed crop urging. SASSY KING was reserved early on the inside, advanced nicely on the rail to the quarter pole, angled out and came four wide into the lane and finished willingly to be clearly second best. ALL TIME CLASSIC dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened, held show award. LTL BEAR SALOON was away alertly, dueled for the lead two wide, then was between rivals by the five sixteenths and weakened. POCOPSON STATION was reserved early four wide, three wide on the turn and came five wide into the lane and had no rally. VISHNU was settled early, between rivals by the five eighths marker and then weakened. SCARY LARRY chased the early pace and was three wide on the backstretch and tired. WILD UNION was off slowly, four wide into the first turn, not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: All Time Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy King
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, advanced inside, angled out 1/4, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Scary Larry
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 3 wide backstretch, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Pocopson Station
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved 4 wide, 3 wide turn, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Wahoowa Wahoowa
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked pace, bid 3 wide, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Ltl Bear Saloon
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, dueled 2 wide, between 5/16, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Vishnu
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, between horses 5/8, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Union
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, 4 wide first turn, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 17000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, if for $14,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TORRID dueled for the early lead two wide, made a two wide bid leaving the turn and drew off to prove much the best, driving. NECCO dueled for the lead three wide on the outside of the winner, could not go with that rivals while saving the place award. CITY OF GOD was settled early on the outside, made a four wide run on the turn and came five wide into the lane and finished willingly to miss the place award. JUSTFORSPEIGHTOFIT chased the early pace, swung out and was four wide by the furlong marker and weakened. SYLVIA I AM was settled along the inside and lacked a rally. MOSES WATER pressed the pace on the inside and weakened. SYNONYM was settled early between rivals, then shuffled back on the turn and was not a threat. REIGNING CHAMPION was bumped leaving the chute, came five wide into the lane and failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Sylvia I Am
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Justforspeightofit
ENTRY.OWNER: Oh Happy Days Stable Crabtree Steve and KMR Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, swung 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Reigning Champion
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped leaving chute, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Synonym
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled between horses, shuffled back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Moses Water
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Torrid
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, bid 2 wide, drew off stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: City of God
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside, 4 wide run turn, came 5 wide, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Necco
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3 wide, bid 3 wide, no match, saved 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 21 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNICKERSINATWIST dueled for the lead on the inside, then rated off the duel by the quarter pole, made a bid leaving the turn and edged clear to prove best, drving. POSITIVE FORCE dueled for the early lead four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn to gain a short lead, but could not go with the winner late while staying on to be second best. MISS CONVEYOR chased the pace along the inside, angled out in the lane and was up for the show award. TIZ MICHELLE'S WAY was settled early on the outside, made a five wide run by the quarter pole, angled in leaving the furlong marker and had a mild late rally. KAREN'S WAY stalked the early pace three wide, four wide by the quarter pole, drifted out in the lane and faded. BOWL OF CHERRIES was reserved early, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. SHATTER ME chased the pace and was three wide on the turn and weakened. SASSY MARTINI lacked a rally. NAIL POLISH dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Conveyor
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, angled out, got 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Knickersinatwist
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable Jackson Stephen G and Jackson Debbie
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, bid upper stretch, edged away, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. Stephen G. Jackson & Debbie Jackson

ENTRY.NAME: Shatter Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 3 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bowl of Cherries
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came 5 wide upper stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Martini
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Nail Polish
ENTRY.COMMENT: dull effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Karen's Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, 4 wide 1/4 pole, drifted out, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Michelle's Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside, 5 wide turn turn, angled in 1/8, mild rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Positive Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 4 wide, bid 3 wide, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHEERS FOR KITTEN pressed the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn to be clear by the quarter pole and drop down to the inside, then remained clear to the wire to prove best under a drive. GRATITUDE ATTITUDE was bumped at the start, then was well rated early, eased out to make a four wide bid nearing the quarter pole, but flattened out the final furlong, second best. SON OF A BEAST was close up on the inside then checked nearing the seven sixteenths, shuffled back to last on the turn, shifted out by the quarter pole and came five wide into the lane and offered a late rally. BRODY'S WAR vied for the early lead two wide and in between rivals, then was on the inside on the turn and weakened. LUCKY LEWIS vied for the lead three wide and in between rivals and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Gratitude Attitude
ENTRY.OWNER: Two Ten Twelve Triple T Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, well rated, bid 4 wide, flattened out, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Son of a Beast
ENTRY.OWNER: J A G Racing and Jettany Thoroughbred Corp.
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, checked 7/16, shuffled back, shift out 1/4, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Brody's War
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead between horses, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Lewis
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide between horses, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Cheers for Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, drew clear, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 17000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, if for $14,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SGT RECKLESS USMC vied for the lead two wide, made a bid to shake clear by the half mile marker, then was clear on the turn and then held sway late to prove best, driving. FOREVER FIFI stalked the early pace and made a four wide bid on the turn, then continued on to the wire slowly gaining but could not get to the winner, second best. LET'S GO MO was reserved on the inside, shifted out at the five sixteenths, four wide by the quarter pole while advancing, angled out in the lane and was along for the show award. DUST BUNNY stalked the pace in between rivals, made a three wide bid by the quarter pole but weakened the final furlong. LONDON LADY vied for the lead on the inside, ridden along on the turn and weakened. QUEENPIN tracked the pace on the inside and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, shift out 5/16, 4 wide 1/4 pole, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: London Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, ridden along turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sgt Reckless USMC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2 wide, bid 2 wide, shook clear turn, held sway, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Queenpin
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Dust Bunny
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable and Davis Kelly
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace between horses, bid 3 wide, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Forever Fifi
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, slowly gaining, 2nd best
